00011 // windy.cpp*
00012 #include "pbrt.h"
00013 #include "texture.h"
00014 #include "paramset.h"
00015 // WindyTexture Declarations
00016 template <class T> class WindyTexture : public Texture<T> {
00017 public:
00018         // WindyTexture Public Methods
00019         ~WindyTexture() {
00020                 delete mapping;
00021         }
00022         WindyTexture(TextureMapping3D *map) {
00023                 mapping = map;
00024         }
00025         T Evaluate(const DifferentialGeometry &dg) const {
00026                 Vector dpdx, dpdy;
00027                 Point P = mapping->Map(dg, &dpdx, &dpdy);
00028                 float windStrength =
00029                         FBm(.1f * P, .1f * dpdx, .1f * dpdy, .5f, 3);
00030                 float waveHeight =
00031                         FBm(P, dpdx, dpdy, .5f, 6);
00032                 return fabsf(windStrength) * waveHeight;
00033         }
00034 private:
00035         // WindyTexture Private Data
00036         TextureMapping3D *mapping;
00037 };
00038 // WindyTexture Method Definitions
00039 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Texture<float> * CreateFloatTexture(const Transform &tex2world,
00040                 const TextureParams &tp) {
00041         // Initialize 3D texture mapping _map_ from _tp_
00042         TextureMapping3D *map = new IdentityMapping3D(tex2world);
00043         return new WindyTexture<float>(map);
00044 }
00045 
00046 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Texture<Spectrum> * CreateSpectrumTexture(const Transform &tex2world,
00047                 const TextureParams &tp) {
00048         // Initialize 3D texture mapping _map_ from _tp_
00049         TextureMapping3D *map = new IdentityMapping3D(tex2world);
00050         return new WindyTexture<Spectrum>(map);
00051 }
